law.catch_line: Risk and needs assessment of criminal risk factors of parole-eligible inmates.
law.text:
The department shall:
Administer a validated risk and needs assessment to assess the criminal risk factors of all inmates who are eligible for parole, or a reassessment of a previously administered risk and needs assessment, before the case is considered by the board;
Provide the results of the most recent risk and needs assessment to the board before an inmate appears before the board; and
Incorporate information from an inmate's criminal risk and needs assessment into the development of his or her case plan.
law.history: Created 2011 Ky. Acts ch. 2, sec. 30, effective June 8, 2011.
